transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I called a couple of days ago about a refill on my naproxen and I was told someone would follow up with me. I haven't heard anything.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling pivot point orthopedics. Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, this is Rebecca Okafor. I'm calling because I was supposed to get a follow-up about my naproxen refill, but no one has reached out to me. Is there any record of my previous call?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Rebecca. Can you please provide your date of birth? I'll check your records and look into your

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, my date of birth is February 28, 2000.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: refill follow-up.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you. I appreciate it.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks, Rebecca. Just to confirm, can you please spell out your first and last name for me? Helps make sure I have your information correct.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Certainly, it's Rebecca, R-E-B-E-C-C-A, and Okafor, O-K-A-F-O-R.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look up your record using the phone number you have on file with us? If so, please tell me that number. If you're not sure, I can confirm your name and date of birth with you again. Which would you prefer?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, you can look it up using my phone number. It's 702-555-0388.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm. Your phone number is seven zero two

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct. 702-555-0388.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: five five five zero three eight, and your date of birth is February

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Actually, the phone number is 702-555-0388, and my date of birth is February 28, 2000.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm unable to pull up your record right now. I'll connect you to our patient support team so they can help with your naproxen refill follow-up. Please stay on the line.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'd really prefer to resolve this now if possible. Can you connect me directly to someone who can assist with the refill on this call?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Live transfer isn't available right now since this is a demo clinic?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I understand, but I really need to get this refill sorted out today. Is there anything else you can do to help me with this immediately?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I understand you want to resolve this right away. I'm unable to connect you to a live person

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I appreciate your help. Could you at least ensure my refill request is prioritized, and someone contacts me today?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: at this moment, but I can document your request and make sure our clinic support team follows up soon as possible. Would you like me to do that for you now?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I appreciate that, but I've already waited without a follow-up. Is there any way to expedite this? I really need the medication soon.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I understand how important this is. Right now, I can't process the refill

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I understand. Please make sure the support team knows this is urgent, and I'd appreciate it if they could contact me as soon as possible. Thank you.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: directly or escalate further since live support isn't available in this demo. I'll make sure your request is documented for urgent follow-up. Someone from our clinic support team will reach out as soon
